item.title: EvolutionaryScale, backed by Amazon and Nvidia, raises $142M for protein-generating AI
item.description:
A relatively new startup called EvolutionaryScale has secured a massive tranche of cash to build AI models to generate novel proteins for scientific research. EvolutionaryScale today announced that it raised $142 million in a seed round led by ex-GitHub CEO Nat Friedman, Daniel Gross and Lux Capital with participation from Amazon and NVentures, Nvidia’s corporate […]

item.title: Microsoft broke antitrust rules by bundling Teams with Office, EU says
item.description: It’s the second major action in as many days by the European Commission against a Big Tech company.

item.title: Reports that Apple and Meta in talks for an AI partnership disputed
item.description: Apple is reportedly talking to Meta about bringing its Meta AI models to Apple Intelligence. Here's what we know.
